timezone.help: What timezone will be used for time based activities like QOTD and birthday.

mod_role.help: The role(s) that will determent if a member can run restricted commands.

join_message.help: The message that sends when a user joins your server, if there is more than 1 it will pick a random one. Only works if 'welcome_message_channel' is set.

join_message_channel.help: The channel that receives a message when a user joins your server.

join_role.help: The role that a user receives when they join your server.

remove_invites_exempt_channels.help: The channel(s) that are exempt from invite removal.

remove_invites_exempt_roles.help: The role(s) that are exempt from invite removal.

birthday_announcement_message.help: The message that sends when it's a users birthday, only works if 'birthday_announcement_channel' is set.

birthday_announcement_channel.help: The channel that receives a message when it's a users birthday.

birthday_role.help: The role that members get if it's their birthday.

qotd_channel.help: The channel that question of the day questions are posted.

qotd_role.help: The role that gets pinged when a new qotd is posted.

qotd_reroll_threshold.help: The number of votes needed for a reroll to happen.

qotd_posttime.help: The time of day where the QOTD question is posted, remebr that 0 is midnight, 12 is noon.

replybot_channel.help: The channel/theads(s) that allows the bot to reply to people.

nitront.help: If users without nitro can use animated emojis in your server by typing the name.
